title: A smart stocking stuffer: This lifetime subscription to StackSkills Unlimited is now under $20
content:
Macworld

Have a curious mind you need to shop for this holiday season? Then StackSkills Unlimited is something they shouldn’t be without. Now, you can get lifelong access to the platform’s courses for only $19.97 (reg. $600) through December 25, and you won’t have to worry about shipping either.

StackSkills Unlimited is a web-based training resource that features a lineup of over 1,000 courses in various subjects. Find courses that teach the basics of information technology, how to code an app, and the finer points of cyber security. Users can discover additional skills and courses in finance, business, marketing, graphic design, and more, all taught by over 350 of the internet’s top instructors.

This learning platform could be an invaluable tool, providing professional and personal growth opportunities. Since access is for life, students can set their own schedules and go at their own pace. In addition, course certification options are included, and new courses are added monthly, giving users a near-endless learning experience.

Gift someone who loves to learn a lifetime subscription to StackSkills Unlimited, now just $19.97 until December 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon is necessary to score this exclusive offer!

 

StackSkills Unlimited: Lifetime Access

Only $19.97 through Macworld

Prices subject to change.
